title: An Act authorizing the Division of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance to grant easements in certain parcels of land to the city of Lowell

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Elliott of Lowell, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Rodney M. Elliott that the commissioner of the Division of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance be authorized to grant easements in certain parcels of land to the city of Lowell.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight
the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 06/24/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on House Ways and Means
committee on House Ways and Means

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass with an amendment, substituting therefor a bill with the same title, see H4772
Referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting for a second reading with the amendment pending
Read second, amended (as recommended by the committee on House Ways and Means)
